mapper.select: select sum(ced.order_pay_amount) orderPayAmount, sum(ced.original_earnings_amount) originalEarningsAmount, sum(ced.actual_earnings_amount) actualEarningsAmount from t_channel_earnings_detail ced join t_channel_earnings ce on ce.status=true and ce.channel_earnings_id=ced.channel_earnings_id left join t_third_business tb on tb.third_business_id=ced.third_business_id left join t_channel ch on ch.channel_id=ce.channel_id left join t_user u on u.user_id=ced.user_id left join t_app ap on ap.app_id=u.app_id where 1=1

select ced.channel_earnings_detail_id, ch.channel_name, ap.app_name, ce.`month`, tb.third_business_name, u.username, ced.order_number, ced.order_pay_amount, ced.original_earnings_amount, ced.settlement_ratio, ced.actual_earnings_amount, ced.remark, DATE_FORMAT(ced.order_pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') order_pay_time, DATE_FORMAT(ce.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time, DATE_FORMAT(ce.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') update_time from t_channel_earnings_detail ced join t_channel_earnings ce on ce.status=true and ce.channel_earnings_id=ced.channel_earnings_id left join t_third_business tb on tb.third_business_id=ced.third_business_id left join t_channel ch on ch.channel_id=ce.channel_id left join t_user u on u.user_id=ced.user_id left join t_app ap on ap.app_id=u.app_id where 1=1
order by ced.order_pay_time desc,ced.create_time desc
